Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AGI is always accessible, while teachers hasn't been very responsive since industrial actions in 24s1. Honestly, I studied at Monash before and after the pandemic, and I can see the student service quality and teaching experience declining.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from teachers are usually generic, and sometimes they dont have time to explain what they meant, but AI is more availble and more responsive. After feeding some concepts learned from lectures, it works better.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI doesnt have an atitude or turn down students when they have genuine questions.
